comment: /** * Converts extendedId to the PDB ID short format. * If extendedId is a valid extended PDB ID, it would be converted to a short ID, * if extendedId is a valid short PDB ID, it would be returned in UPPER CASE, * a {@link StructureException} is thrown otherwise. * @param extendedId the PDB ID to convert to short format * @return the ID in the short UPPER CASE format. * @throws StructureException if the conversion was not possible. */
